column4: hello, ive been trying to get a driver for my tablet pc pen (i dont think it exists) but i ran into a source that was talking about using windows drivers in a wrapper for linux, does anyone have any info on this?
maybe they're talking about ndiswrapper??  i know people use that for wireless card drivers
could be, would that work for any driver?
i don't know, that's a guess, it's worth looking into
